full_text:
Ahead of tomorrow's games, here are the NFL's Best Performers on Thanksgiving Day.
ğŸˆ No surprise to see Jason Witten on the list (16 games!)
ğŸˆ Tom Brady comes to play on Turkey Day
ğŸˆ Mark Sanchez obviously remains an NFL Thanksgiving icon

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/OMPV7o455y

Welp, I am extremely mad at myself.  After running this week's simulations and seeing that - checks notes - the @steelers were estimated to be the 3rd best team in the nation, I knew something was amiss.  #nflverse https://t.co/2zq0HRlbTr

So I went digging through my code, and low and behold, a single instance in which I called "predict" on a gamlss object, but used "new_data" instead of "newdata", meaning that the simulation was looping through training data predictions #nflverse

This, of course, was not ideal, and while its issue was mitigated by the other parts of the algorithm, it obviously was causing incorrect outcomes, and therefore, poor estimates of strength and game-by-game predictions.  I am deeply sorry if I have misled you :( #nflverse
